titles.title: International Documentary Exchange Act of 2010
A bill to authorize grants for an international documentary exchange program.
International Documentary Exchange Act of 2010

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary: International Documentary Exchange Act of 2010 - Authorizes the Secretary of State to make grants to U.S. filmmakers and nongovernmental organizations that use independently produced documentary films to promote a better understanding of the United States among individuals in other countries.
